Given its immense value and utility, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $10,000 to you, at a competitive rate. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer
